A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never felt emotion like I did in this movie. The bad: Canto Bight. This world does not belong in Star Wars. Nuff said. The good: Everything else. Amazing. No spoiler\, but the scene with the millennium falcon flying through the core of Crait was Star Wars gold. I keep playing that scene in my head with the music. Literally unforgettable. You must experience this.
